categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: E.C. "Easy" Nerwal was a TIE pilot in the Imperial Navy who became the commander of the Avenger Squadron, a unit of TIE Avengers.

Nerwal and his unit would later be assigned to Task Force Vengeance, lead by Admiral Wooyou Senn. It was centered around the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Vengeance. They were tasked within pacify the Airam sector.
